thread.title: Wicked Campers may have had their last laugh as states move to stamp out sexist slogans
thread.title_full: Wicked Campers may have had their last laugh as states move to stamp out sexist slogans

author: Jenny Noyes
title: Wicked Campers may have had their last laugh as states move to stamp out sexist slogans
text:
twitter TWEET More 
If any company embodies the philosophy that "literally any publicity is good publicity", it's Wicked Campers. For years, the company has remained steadfast in its mission to paint vans with the kind of vile, and often violent, misogynistic "jokes" anyone in their right mind would be embarrassed and ashamed to be seen driving around with. And they've done this despite waves of complaints, social media outrage, petitions and boycotts that most companies in their right mind would have tried to PR their way out of a long time ago. 
But it seems Wicked Campers may finally have had its last laugh, as states introduce bills specifically targeting the company, by making slogans that demean and degrade women and other groups an offence that could see vehicles bearing them deregistered. SHARE
